locale.error: Ops. I don't know the language *{{language}}*

firstUse.message1: My name is {{botName}} and from now on I will help you with some tasks using the Slack.
firstUse.message2: Before I need you to do some settings. How was you who started me I will define you as my system administrator. So you can access the settings in the future.
firstUse.message3: Initially I do not know perform tasks. But there are gears that when coupled to me add me skills.
firstUse.message4: At this time all the gears are active. You can deactivate them using the command
firstUse.message5: Some gears have settings. To let them use the command
firstUse.message6: Below is a list of gears available:

activation.logs: See the detailed error in logs

feature.onlyChannel: Sorry, this feature can only be performed on a channel.
feature.onlyPrivate: Sorry, this feature can only be performed directly with me in private.
